ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank Tammy Bischoff , BSN, MPH, from Infection Prevention for her invaluable help in the identification of cases.

Financial support. This research has been possible thanks to the 2019 Medical Student Research Program, supported through the Wake Forest University School of Medicine and the Kulynych Endowed Interdisciplinary Cancer Research Fund.

Potential conflicts of interest. The authors do not have conflicts of interest. Both authors: no reported conflicts of interest. Both authors have submitted the ICMJE Form for Disclosure of Potential Conflicts of Interest. Conflicts that the editors consider relevant to the content of the manuscript have been disclosed.
